item.title: ABC Affiliate in Sacramento Hit by Gunshots a Day After Kimmel Protest
item.description: Three shots were fired into a window at the ABC affiliate in Sacramento on Friday, a day after a protest was held outside the station over Jimmy Kimmel’s suspension. The police are investigating

item.title: ABC Affiliate in Sacramento Hit by Gunshots a Day After Kimmel Protest
item.description: Three shots were fired into a window at the ABC affiliate in Sacramento on Friday, a day after a protest was held outside the station over Jimmy Kimmel’s suspension. The police are investigating

item.title: Jay Leno Is “on Jimmy Kimmel’s Side” Amid ABC Suspension: “It’s a Comedian Talking; If You Don’t Like It, Don’t Watch It”
item.description: “You don’t get canceled [for] saying popular things. Usually it’s the truth that winds up getting canceled, so we’ll see what happens.” said Leno of the late night host.

item.title: Jay Leno Is “on Jimmy Kimmel’s Side” Amid ABC Suspension: “It’s a Comedian Talking; If You Don’t Like It, Don’t Watch It”
item.description: “You don’t get canceled [for] saying popular things. Usually it’s the truth that winds up getting canceled, so we’ll see what happens.” said Leno of the late night host.

item.title: Marvel Stars Stand for Jimmy Kimmel: Pedro Pascal Defends Free Speech While Others Endorse Boycott
item.description: Hollywood stars — including those with Disney, ABC, Hulu and Marvel Cinematic Universe credits — are continuing to show their support for the ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’ host in the wake of his suspension.

item.title: Marvel Stars Stand for Jimmy Kimmel: Pedro Pascal Defends Free Speech While Others Endorse Boycott
item.description: Hollywood stars — including those with Disney, ABC, Hulu and Marvel Cinematic Universe credits — are continuing to show their support for the ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’ host in the wake of his suspension.

item.title: Damon Lindelof Says He Won’t Work With ABC, Disney Unless Jimmy Kimmel Suspension Is Lifted Soon
item.description: The ‘Lost’ co-creator also vouched for the late night host’s character following his suspension, saying “he is caring and empathic and grateful.”

item.title: Damon Lindelof Says He Won’t Work With ABC, Disney Unless Jimmy Kimmel Suspension Is Lifted Soon
item.description: The ‘Lost’ co-creator also vouched for the late night host’s character following his suspension, saying “he is caring and empathic and grateful.”

item.title: Conan O’Brien Says Jimmy Kimmel Suspension “Should Disturb Everyone”: “It’s Wrong”
item.description: The former ‘Late Night’ and ‘Tonight Show’ host is one of many late night TV personalities who have voiced their disapproval of ABC’s decision to pre-empt ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’

item.title: Conan O’Brien Says Jimmy Kimmel Suspension “Should Disturb Everyone”: “It’s Wrong”
item.description: The former ‘Late Night’ and ‘Tonight Show’ host is one of many late night TV personalities who have voiced their disapproval of ABC’s decision to pre-empt ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’

item.title: Podcast Bros Andrew Schulz, Tim Dillon, Tom Segura Voice Support for Kimmel. But Joe Rogan Silent
item.description: A few top podcaster-comedians are expressing support for Jimmy Kimmel. Yet constant free speech advocate Rogan has remained mum on the issue.

item.title: Podcast Bros Andrew Schulz, Tim Dillon, Tom Segura Voice Support for Kimmel. But Joe Rogan Silent
item.description: A few top podcaster-comedians are expressing support for Jimmy Kimmel. Yet constant free speech advocate Rogan has remained mum on the issue.

item.title: Jon Stewart Nervously Tackles Jimmy Kimmel Suspension in ‘Daily Show’ Return
item.description: ‘The Daily Show’ host returned to the news desk Thursday and took a rather unusual tact for mocking conservative blowback to Kimmel’s monologue.

item.title: Jon Stewart Nervously Tackles Jimmy Kimmel Suspension in ‘Daily Show’ Return
item.description: ‘The Daily Show’ host returned to the news desk Thursday and took a rather unusual tact for mocking conservative blowback to Kimmel’s monologue.

item.title: Seth Meyers Stresses Value of Free Speech Amid Jimmy Kimmel Suspension: “We’re Gonna Keep Doing Our Show the Way We’ve Always Done It”
item.description: “It is a privilege and an honor to call Jimmy Kimmel my friend, in the same way that it’s a privilege and honor to do this show every night,” the late-night host added.

item.title: Seth Meyers Stresses Value of Free Speech Amid Jimmy Kimmel Suspension: “We’re Gonna Keep Doing Our Show the Way We’ve Always Done It”
item.description: “It is a privilege and an honor to call Jimmy Kimmel my friend, in the same way that it’s a privilege and honor to do this show every night,” the late-night host added.

item.title: Seth Meyers Jokes He’s ‘Always Admired’ Trump After Kimmel Suspension, Promises ‘We’re Gonna Keep Doing Our Show the Way We’ve Always Done It’

item.title: Stephen Colbert Rips ABC Pulling Jimmy Kimmel as ‘Blatant Censorship’ to Appease Trump: ‘With an Autocrat, You Cannot Give an Inch’
item.description: Stephen Colbert came to the defense of fellow late-night host Jimmy Kimmel on Thursday’s “The Late Show” on CBS, using his monologue to blast ABC executives for indefinitely suspendi

item.title: Hollywood Teamsters React to Jimmy Kimmel Suspension, Rail Against Corporate Consolidation
item.description: The union, whose general president has the ear of President Donald Trump, added that government encouragement of a clampdown on free speech is “inappropriate and lethal for our democracy and economy.”

item.title: Hollywood Teamsters React to Jimmy Kimmel Suspension, Rail Against Corporate Consolidation
item.description: The union, whose general president has the ear of President Donald Trump, added that government encouragement of a clampdown on free speech is “inappropriate and lethal for our democracy and economy.”

item.title: ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’ Suspension Echoes an Earlier ABC Late Night Controversy
item.description: Bill Maher was excoriated for comments about 9/11 on ‘Politically Incorrect,’ but the network didn’t pull the show.

item.title: David Letterman Reacts to Kimmel’s Suspension by ABC, Calls Trump an “Authoritarian Criminal”
item.description: At the Atlantic Festival in New York on Thursday, the late night host had some choice words about ABC’s indefinite suspension of the show.

item.title: David Letterman Reacts to Kimmel’s Suspension by ABC, Calls Trump an “Authoritarian Criminal”

item.title: Trump Claims Kimmel Was “Fired” for “Lack of Talent” After ABC Late Night Show Pulled
item.description: The ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’ host’s comments on the Charlie Kirk shooting led to his show being “preempted indefinitely” on Thursday, leading the president to gloat over his longtime foe’s troubles.

item.title: Trump Claims Kimmel Was “Fired” for “Lack of Talent” After ABC Late Night Show Pulled
item.description: The ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’ host’s comments on the Charlie Kirk shooting led to his show being “preempted indefinitely” on Thursday, leading the president to gloat over his longtime foe’s troubles.

item.title: Hollywood Unions Say Jimmy Kimmel Suspension “Chills Free Speech,” Threatens Artist Livelihoods
item.description: WGA is also mounting a protest as the unions continue to hit back at ABC’s decision.

item.title: Greg Gutfeld Rips Jimmy Kimmel: “The Guy Who Shot Charlie Kirk Was Likely a Fan of Yours”
item.description: The Fox News personality laid into his fellow talk-show host amid ABC pulling Kimmel’s late-night show over comments about Charlie Kirk’s shooter.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel Insists He’s “Not Moving to Italy” Despite Citizenship
item.description: The ABC late-night host, returning Tuesday night after his summer off, also responded to Trump saying he’d be the next late-night host to lose his job.
